snippet: Threats and obstacles have been part of Jacqueline Moudeina’s life since she and a handful of others set out to bring to justice Hissène Habré.
abstract: Chadian lawyer Jacqueline Moudeina has dedicated herself to bringing former Pres Hissene Habre, who committed egregious human rights violations in 1980s, to justice, remaining true to cause despite numerous threats and 2001 grenade attack that seriously injured her.
lead_paragraph: Threats and obstacles have been part of Jacqueline Moudeina’s life since she and a handful of others set out to bring to justice Hissène Habré.

headline.main: Surviving Grenade and Terror to Bring Chad’s Ex-Leader to Trial
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Outlasts Grenade and Terror to Bring Ex-Leader of Chad to Trial

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
